items.creator: @yixingweb3
items.title:
RT by @JingHao668899: 随着 #Grass 上所暴涨, 最高触及 2 u 

Depin 这个赛道再次引爆市场 🔥

第一次听说 Grass 是 23 年 12 月, 没参与原因是忙着打铭文
第二次听说 Grass 是 24 年 4 月, 没参与原因是听说快发币了

早期参与的个人都获得了几百几千个 Grass

羡慕没用, 不如想想下一步如何布局 👇

铭文 Ordi 之后还有 Sats, Rats, 电报 Not 之后还有 Dogs

Grass 作为 depin 赛道的龙头, 上 bn 是迟早的事

Grass 第一期空投了总量 10 %, 第二期将空投总量 17 %

第二期依然值得参与, 同时要关注类似的项目, 潜在的龙二龙三

☑️ Depin

Depin 是通过去中心化的方式提供物理基础设施服务, 让参与者获得奖励

简单说就是, 把用户个人闲置的资源 (带宽, 存储, 计算等) 借给有需要的 web3 企业使用
企业节省了购买服务器的成本, 用户得到回报奖励

众多参与者还能推广 web3, 促进区块链发展
可见 Depin 是有实际价值的

不管真有价值, 还是没有价值, Depin 作为一个新的赛道, 新的叙事, 都是值得参与的

不能对任何新概念抱有偏见, 就像这次 Grass 突然成为近半年最大的大毛 

Grass 详细教程👇

#撸毛 #零撸 #挖矿 #Grass #小草 #Depin #Gradient

items.creator: @ZeshApps
items.title:
RT by @MrMike_91: New partnership:
ZESH x SFT 🚀

We’re thrilled to announce our partnership with @SFTProtocol, the 'Chain of Chains' bridging physical infrastructure with #Web3!

By connecting storage, computing, and edge CDN, SFT’s #DePIN platform is redefining decentralized power, and we’re joining forces to push the boundaries of  #GrowthFi! 💡🔗

Together, Zesh and SFT are bringing AI-driven tools to a new level, driving genuine community growth and utility across Web3! 🌎✨

items.creator: @ASI_Alliance
items.title:
RT by @YddYannick: The ASI AI DePIN stack is technology infrastructure that can be used to devise a number of decentralized AI solutions.

ASI:Create uses ASI DePIN to deliver an ASI Core node that contains services for cross-chain agent registration, AI, knowledge, data, compute, hosting and payments. 

Self-governance authentications will be designed from the ground up to ensure capabilities for privacy preserving avatars for developers. This will enable the AI community to rapidly form their spaces with markets that are crowdfunded with commoditized crypto assets via liquid staking and more.
@SingularityNET @bengoertzel
